original: 據有荊州要地，為當地名士。品性仁善，為官清廉，理政有方，固守一方有成，觀天下之變，謀定而後動。
text: According to the important land in Jingzhou, it is a local celebrity. Good character, clean and honest officials, good governance, clinging to one party to achieve success, observing changes in the world, making decisions before acting.
